select cs.coupon_id as couponId,c.coupon_name as couponName,c.coupon_price as couponPrice from coupon_skill cs LEFT JOIN coupon c ON c.coupon_id = cs.coupon_id LEFT JOIN activity a ON a.activity_id = c.activity_id where cs.skill_item_id = #{skillItemId} and cs.status = 1 and c.get_way = 1 and ( NOW() BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time) and ( NOW() BETWEEN c.start_time AND c.end_time) order by c.coupon_price desc LIMIT 1

SELECT cc.id AS customerCouponId, cou.coupon_Id as couponId, cou.coupon_Name as couponName, cou.coupon_price as couponDeductPrice FROM customer_coupon cc LEFT JOIN coupon cou ON cc.coupon_id = cou.coupon_id WHERE ( SELECT count(1) FROM coupon_skill WHERE skill_item_id = #{skillItemId} AND coupon_id = cc.coupon_id AND STATUS = 1 ) > 0 AND cc.customer_id = #{customerId} AND ( NOW() BETWEEN cou.start_time AND cou.end_time OR cou.is_permanent = 1 ) AND cc.is_used = 0 ORDER BY cou.coupon_price DESC, cou.end_time DESC LIMIT 1
